generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with a cobblestone texture, extending into the distance, which is consistent with a road.
- sidewalk: There are clearly defined pedestrian paths on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs or fences, indicating sidewalks.
- building: A white building with a door and windows is visible in the background, which qualifies as a building.
- fence: A black metal fence runs along the left side of the road, which is a fence.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible along the sidewalk and road, including one with a red and white striped pattern, which are poles.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road, which is a traffic sign.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green and yellow leaves are present throughout the image, which are vegetation.
- terrain: There is a grassy area on the right side of the road, which is terrain.
- person: Two individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk to the right, which are persons.
- car: A white car is parked on the left side of the road, which is a car.
